Name: Crimson Witch of Flames
Title: Blazing Dissipation: Crimson Witch of Flames
Desc: "I will sing no elegies. I refuse laments. I shall not sigh. I have no use for pointless noise.\nIf justice is long dead, then to whom can I offer redemption?"

Talent.Name: Crimson Witch of Flames
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When you play a {SPRITE_PRESET#3006}Talent card or a Character uses a Skill:</color> Spend 1 less {SPRITE_PRESET#1103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro</color> Die. (Once per Round)\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Roll Phase:</color> 2 of the starting Elemental Dice you roll are always guaranteed to be {SPRITE_PRESET#1103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro</color>.\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)
